name: CommonAPI C++ D-Bus
tagline: A CommonAPI C++ binding for D-Bus.
body:
### Welcome to CommonAPI C++ for D-Bus!
CommonAPI C++ is a C++ framework for interprocess and network communication which defines a high-level C++ API that can be used for different IPC mechanisms such as D-Bus.  Please visit [http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-core-tools/](http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-core-tools/) if you are new to CommonAPI C++.

In principle the CommonAPI C++ D-Bus binding is based on the standard D-Bus library ([http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/dbus](http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/dbus/)) but needs some patches of libdbus which are published together with the runtime code of the D-Bus binding.

### Basic Features
* High-performance serialization of D-Bus messages including introspection. 

### Links
* Code generator (git): [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-dbus-tools/](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-dbus-tools/)
* Runtime Code (git): [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-dbus-runtime](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-dbus-runtime/)
* Source code as zip/tar, code generator (executable), pdf-doc: [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-tools-runtime/releases](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-tools-runtime/releases)
* Eclipse update-site: [http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-dbus-tools/updatesite/](http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-dbus-tools/updatesite)
* Wiki: [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-dbus-tools/wiki/](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-dbus-tools/wiki/)

### Support
Please mail to the GENIVI ipc mailing list, see [http://lists.genivi.org/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/genivi-ipc/](http://lists.genivi.org/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/genivi-ipc/)
